title: Who can I contact about putting a turn arrow at the intersection of Carolina Beach Road and Raleigh Road? With all the company\'s that are down that road, Pepsi, Progress Energy, Terex and many others, there is so much traffic trying to make left hand turns down Raleigh Road, especially in the morning. A turn arrow would make it much easier on the busy traffic.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. You can contact the N.C. Department of Transportation Divsion 3 office in Wilmington. http://www.ncdot.gov/doh/operations/division3/ Here's a link to an item on current traffic signal plans along Carolina Beach Road: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=5593
